sleeper-api.description: Sleeper fantasy football platform — league sync, player projections, ADP
sleeper-api.note: REST, no auth required for public endpoints. League-specific data needs league_id.

nflverse.note: Accessed via Python nfl_data_py bridge (server/python/). Not a direct MCP server — routed through Flask secondary API.

notes: TIBER uses a hybrid approach: Sleeper API is called directly from Node.js, while nflverse data flows through a Python/Flask bridge. The MCP config here documents the external dependencies for Cowork context. As MCP adapters become available for these sources, swap the REST calls for native MCP connections.
